name: Hasempfeffer
description:
Eat the pesky bunnies! Watch out for gophers!

Created in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 40

Theme: "The more there are, the worse it is."

Download "Hasempfeffer.Win32 - LD40.zip" for the competition version.

Download "Hasempfeffer.Win32.zip" for the improved (post-competition) version.
